settings.title: Inside a Lipsology Reading with Ariana
settings.desc: Curious about what to expect? Three of our staffers give a virtual Lipsology reading a try while wearing Rose Inc’s new Satin Lipsticks.

Kacie is wearing Rose Inc Satin Lip Color Rich Refillable Lipstick in Besotted

One kiss on the paper and Ariana knew that Kacie is a detail-orientated person who works hard and shines as a problem solver at work, all thanks to the size, shape, and placement of her prints.

See the small, funnel-like shape at the edge of her print? Ariana says that space means Kacie’s an excellent listener who’s great at keeping secrets. But Ariana also noticed something that needs attention: The faint color of Kacie’s transfer—which Ariana calls “ghost prints”—means she’s overdue for a vacation and needs to unplug to refuel her creative energy. That means she must be away from home, with no work, for at least three days — Lipsologist’s orders!

settings.quotes: “Lipsology is the art and science of reading lip prints…”

settings.desc:
Courtney is wearing Rose Inc Satin Lip Color Rich Refillable Lipstick in Eloquent

Generous, expressive, and great at multitasking is how Ariana describes Courtney thanks to her full, tall lipstick print. Meanwhile, her distinct Cupid’s Bow means she likes to make people happy, which in turn makes her a great negotiator, Ariana notes. Courtney’s long and wide print means she’s a good hugger, Ariana adds, while her slightly up-turned transfer means she may wobble during stressful times, but she never falls.

Lexy is wearing Rose Inc Satin Lip Color Rich Refillable Lipstick in Persuasive

Stubborn, independent and stressed is how Ariana first read Lexy’s lip transfers, so the reading started with a piece of advice: Rest is needed. While the other two transfers feature open space, Lexy’s lips are pursed closed. Ironically enough, she created this print the day before a long weekend getaway, so Ariana suggested a follow-up appointment: Your print can change by the hour based on your emotions, so it’s a true snapshot of that moment and will likely show less tension next time.

settings.title: Enter To Win
settings.text_center:
Enter to win two 15-minute virtual Lipsology readings (one for you and one for a friend, family member, or partner); two Rose Inc Satin Lipsticks to wear during the reading; and $100 worth of Rose Inc skin and makeup essentials.

Three winners will be randomly selected on Tuesday, March 29 and informed via email. Good luck!
